name: @mitranim/jol
description: JS Collection Classes. Tiny extensions on JS built-in classes such as `Object`, `Array`, `Set`, `Map`, with nice features such as: easy-to-use typed collections with automatic idempotent element instantiation; dictionary with support for structured keys which are compared by value, not by reference; consistent constructor signatures, avoiding Array pitfalls. Tiny, dependency-free, single-file, native module.
